attributes.action: Lead a co-ordinated Commonwealth intervention using all available military, healthcare, humanitarian aid and reconstruction resources to relieve to people of Zimbabwe of their government inflicted misery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Zimbabwe (Rhodeasia) is a member of our commonwealth and it's people deserve our urgent intervention to free them of tyranny, starvation, disease and abject poverty. We the people of the Commonwealth should demand of all our leaders to acts with all due haste to intervene with military, humanitarian aid, NGO,logistics and reconstruction resources to firstly stablilise and then assist with rebuilding this once great nation. We CANNOT and MUST NOT stand idly by and blame this on the regime whilst innocent people are suffering and dying daily. NOW is the time to enact "regime change" by whatever means on humaintarian & moral rather than oil based economic grounds as in the recent past.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
